clang-analyzer-cplusplus.ArrayDelete.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-cplusplus.ArrayDelete
Reports destructions of arrays of polymorphic objects that are destructed as
their base class.
The
clang-analyzer-cplusplus.ArrayDelete
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-cplusplus.ArrayDelete.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
